Reviews.Content: hotel cant beat price wife carlsbad live arizona typically stay family friends we’re town little girl 1 ½ yrs easier family own space growing carlsbad i’ve noticed hotel tucked culdesac notice remodeled exterior interior they’ve drab space shining gem title location hotel walking distance carlsbad offer it’s bit distance beach you’re trucking kids stuff kids stuff surfboard suggestion bring folding wagon cart hotel offer guest couple wagons hand loan guest families hopefully read pick costco nice noticed couple improved reason i’m giving 4 5 rating you’re update entire hotel furniture carpet paint rid dirty popcorn ceilings yes extra cost involved brand look dirty popcorn ceiling threw stood bed modern looking bedding bed skirt box spring bit beat stood easy fix nicer rest kitchen handy baby easily fix meals staff friendly helpful hotel doesn’t regular cleaning schedule request requested cleaning service request towels dish soap kitchen flash waiting you’re arriving via own car suggest bringing bikes hotel walking distance time we’re bringing bikes couple town rent bikes day week that’s option stay extended stay definitely returning
